items.text: lunges forward and defends off a thick inside edge to short fine.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fired full and flat on the stumps, defended
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: worked wide of square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: drifts in a full ball from around the stumps, defended back
items.shortText: Mohammed to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full toss on off, punched to long-off
items.shortText: Mohammed to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: driven with the spin to long-off.
items.shortText: Mohammed to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: another full toss which he bunts to long-off, raises the century stand
items.shortText: Mohammed to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: right to the pitch of the ball as he eases to long-off.
items.shortText: Mohammed to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: makes room and drives to long-off, 42nd half-century in ODIs for Tamim. His third against West Indies.
items.shortText: Mohammed to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: right to the pitch as he blocks
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: big appeal as this one spins back in to beat the inside edge. Bishoo was adamant this was hitting, umpire S Ravi thought it was doing too much. No reviews available, remember
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: pulled all along the ground to deep square
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: lunges forward and blocks this one
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: drifts in to deflect off the pad to short fine
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 leg bye

items.text: rocks back and crashes this to the point boundary, brings up his half-century. Shakib's 37th
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: play and a miss. Looked to deflect this past the keeper, sharp turn.
items.shortText: Mohammed to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: eased back past the bowler to long-off.
items.shortText: Mohammed to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: clean strike! Key was hitting straight and he did just that. One bounce into the ropes. Lovely
items.shortText: Mohammed to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.preText: Anayet Hossain: "Will be interesting to see sakib and miraz bowling" -- Sure, they'll want at least 250. Currently on track to get there.
items.text: right back as he defends this quicker delivery past cover.
items.shortText: Mohammed to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: driven straight to cover.
items.shortText: Mohammed to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: magnificent! Stepped out, but the bowler tried to outfox him by firing this a touch wide. No problem. Shakib made room and lofted this inside-out over cover.
items.shortText: Mohammed to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: punches this length ball to deep point.
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full and straight on the stumps, defended back.
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: crisp drive on the up to deep point
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: leading edge but lands short of cover. Skids through at length, extra bounce as well as Shakib looked to tuck this into the legside.
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
